issue.title: [CF 586] GCD timer sweep/animation not showing
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Icon type: Spell Cooldown
2. Group is then incorporated into a meta icon
3. priority is set to normal

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
- GCD sweep animation on the spell/meta icon. Like if I was spamming an instant spell (arcane shot) I want the GCD sweep animation to show on the icon.
- Icon just appears static and changes to the next one in priority after activating the spell.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
6.0.2

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No errors appear when issue happens

comments.body:
Check out the latest alpha version: http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/files/

A setting was added to the cooldown sweep to allow the GCD to show on a per-icon basis instead of the old profile-wide "Timers ignore GCD" setting.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Going to mark the ticket as fixed. If you have issues with the new setting in 6.0.3 alpha, open a new ticket.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
